title: OCE Language Barriers: An unsolvable issue?
body:
I mostly play LoL for the social aspect these days. I've hit Diamond 5 which is well above where I ever thought I could get, so I mostly kick it in some ARAMs and low level normals. I love chatting to people and having a bit of fun, it's a huge aspect of gaming for me. As Australia is a largely multicultural country, our gamers come from a huge variety of countries. We get a lot of Asian migrants/students which is great for diversity. 

However, in gaming it creates a lot of issues due to language barriers. For example, 90% of my games today consisted of nothing but boxes in my chat. No ability to socialise, would have been even worse if I was playing seriously as I'd have no way to communicate.. I was going to maybe suggest a Match Making by location option, I'd be more than happy to wait the extra few minutes to increase my chances of getting English speaking team mates.  Inb4 racist, but it is predominantly players of asian ethnicity that are the worst when it comes to flaming/abuse. If I'm playing for fun, to kick back and relax, I don't want that crap.

Anyone else had similar experiences?

replies.body:
> but it is predominantly players of asian ethnicity that are the worst when it comes to flaming/abuse.

Racist?

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=3YHjERHG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-15T09:20:48.743+0000)
>
> Racist?

That's not racism, it's an observation from his experiences when playing with people of Asian ethnicity.

Generalizing is the first form of racism. Not to mention, he has so little evidence to back up his claim. Also too many flaws in the evidence provided.

+ How does he even know they are Asian? Could just be players who prefer to use foreign languages, for practice or to think they are cooler.


+ The sample size is biased. Not only is it too small, but out of players who speak different languages on OCE, most of them will be Asian. Since all other foreign players, such as German or Spanish, will be on other servers due to ping issues.


+ If he was able to see the population of Asian players that do not flame. It's likely this post wouldn't even be up here. The problem is he can't see the player behind the keyboard, so he just assumes based on chat. Most Asian non-flamers will go unnoticed.

All of this means that his "fact" that 

_"predominantly players of asian ethnicity that are the worst when it comes to flaming/abuse"_ 

is actually, an opinion. Making it racist.

It's a biased observation that was used to form a biased and racist opinion.

what he said about chinese player is actually true...
i came from the china server, so i can assure you at lease that one was not a racist comment

not saying he is not a racist person...

No racist would be saying they are this way because they're worse people ect. I'm merely making an observation. I get flamed by people by all backgrounds, but it's typical Asians that seem to be quick to judge and abuse me for not understanding their language. I don't think negatively about it, just a recurring theme I've noticed

People calling the ones having to deal with this shit "Racist" need to quiet down.

The games servers are hosted in Sydney
The host is called Riot Sydney
At launch and a year after, its population was a good 35/55 between Australians and New Zealanders, with that 10 being other like New Caledonia and whatever other Asian counties are within the OCE Borders

The fact that players are coming in and refusing to speak English to the what used to be about 90% English Speaking Nation players is the problem. 

If you're in a 5, and all of your teammates are speaking the language of your choice be it literally whatever (Chinese, Espanol, French for the New Caledonia players), thats fine. You've got nobody to talk to who can only understand English besides the enemy team, which you dont need to communicate with to win.

But as long as there is one person, the one Australian or New Zealander trying to play the game on the server they fought hard for, the server they cried for so they wouldnt have to try and play on 250 ping, it should be on the 4 people refusing to speak the language that 90% of the server is talking to change for the team.

The sad way League of Legends is now is that you honestly cant speak up against it, they'll just 4 man report you for "Toxic/Racist" and you'll get the chat ban and the eventual suspension. Not even abusive, just asking them to translate. They'll respond with "sb" or something along those lines, or just cuss you out with their rectangles. Honestly i'd love to know if Riot Sydney even has a team to deal with that, do they have people translating these reports? They could be saying the most fucked up toxic shit but because they just appear as boxes, be getting away with it.

This honestly doesnt have to be a problem. Garena servers exist. Why people need to go out of their way to play on a server and refuse to communicate when they can deal with the extra 80 ping boost and have people that they can actually cooperate with is beyond me. 

How many people do you see go from the US or any other English speaking nation go onto BR or LAN and play ranked on there, just to speak english and fuck up their team? Im absolutely certain thats report worthy. 

If Riot or the people calling this idea of "Anybody can speak any language on any server in public matches and if you disagree you're racist" doesn't think this is an issue, why are servers still locked and transfers still paid? Why not pull a DotA2 and have regions be just a checkbox? Have Russians in every match? Have them ruin your LP gains?

Reporting them does nothing either. Every person refusing to speak english i report for Refusal to Communicate, but as with every other report if its not "Verbal Abuse" its useless. You're better off greifing them, because at least you wont get punished.
I am Asian i don't know what sb mean until  i searched on the internet lol
lol i guess you are not from main-land china then?
You're lucky. I keep finding people that speak in pinyin... That's much worse. Premades are your best option.
i am chinese and even i hate pinyin lol

i will give you points of stating the fact that asian (mainly main-land chinese) players has really bad flaming issue
which is the main reason why i left China server and came to OCE
hoping for a better community

you are basically saying "*cough* off from OCE if you can't, or will not speak english" with out saying it out loud

well...

how would you actually use that function? 
selection base on state? or city? 
or COUNTRY OF ORIGIN? 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

tried many time myself but no success

I agree with you 100%, its really hard to play especially late at night without getting non english speakers. I dont want to generalise but alot of the time they are fairly bad and play extremely aggressive and feed alot.

You are racist! Either that or an ignorant.  Neither of which is a good thing or should be listened to.

Some background:

- I'm latin-american and my native language is Spanish
- I moved to AU about 10 months ago, before that I was living in my home country for years, and before that I live in USA for 5 years.
- I'm fluent in english though it is my second language. 
- I'm a permanent AU resident, I've got a really good job and a pay my taxes

I played in the NA server for about 3 years, then switched to LAN (latin-american north) and now I have been in OCE for about 9 months.

My best buddies in OCE server are asian, one latin american and a few AU/NZ.  

- While we are skyping , I don't care if they speak english, bahasa, madarin or spanish.  I like them the same.  
- If I find a duo queue that only speaks mandarin... guess what... they are very likely to speak english as well. If they don't talk to you in english is because THEY DON'T WANT TO.
- In ALL servers there is people that you SIMPLY DON'T WANT TO TALK TO OTHERS.  It has NOTHING TO DO WITH LANGUAGE, NATIONALITY or anything else.  

Simply put.  If they don't want to talk to you, they will not.  I've seen it in all servers.  In Fact in LAN it is most noticebly because EVERYONE speaks spanish.  However, if they don't feel like talking to you, they won't.  Saying "oh they must be american because they don't want to talk to me in spanish". That is ridiculous

_**In other words.  People are assholes when they are assholes.  If they don't want to talk to you they won't.  Doesn't matter where they are from or what languages they speak**_  

This is why you are racists.

Literally none of the points you mentioned relate to my post at all. I'm not getting disappointed about people not talking, I'm not forcing anyone to socialise. What I'm saying is it can be frustrating when you cannot communicate with team mates when not one single player speaks English. Much the same if you were playing on LAN (where you said the majority speak Spanish) and your 4 team mates spoke something completely different.

Also way to make a huge amount of assumptions about me being an Australian. The majority of people I play with on LoL are either Chinese (which I can speak conversational level) or Korean. My immediate group that I play with are all English speaking Australians sure, but for random duos or pick up normal games they are mostly foreign. My Asian friends mostly all admit they are very clique, and will often flame/bully Aussie players because they are "inferior" and a "trash white dog player". 

So basically all your assumptions about me make you sound ignorant, or perhaps you've compared me to the "typical bogan Aussie" and you're racist yourself?
